name: htb-domain-extractor
args: curl -sI --max-time 30 -L http://{{target}} -w 'FINAL_URL: %{url_effective}\nREDIRECT_URL: %{redirect_url}\n' | grep -E '(FINAL_URL|REDIRECT_URL|Location:)' | grep -oE '[a-zA-Z0-9.-]+\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}' | head -1 && echo '=== DISCOVERED DOMAIN ABOVE === Copy and use with FFUF subdomain templates'
description: HTB domain extractor from redirects - outputs discovered domain to console for manual use with FFUF
author: HTB Team
